Package view.components.controls

Class ControllerJoystick

java.lang.Object
view.components.controls.ControllerJoystick
All Implemented Interfaces:
SettingChangeListener, MouvementInputs
public class ControllerJoystick
extends java.lang.Object
implements MouvementInputs, SettingChangeListener
An implementation used to represent the inputs of the game controller
Author:
TRAFNY Theo - UPSSITECH
